ComicInfo.Summary: Zealot and Void join the struggle to save their boss, Marlowe, from the Daemonite, S'yrn. As Backlash and Taboo are fugitives from justice, the Savage Dragon keeps trying to arrest them even though they are in the middle of a pitched battle with supervillains.
ComicInfo.Writer: Brett Booth,Jeff Mariotte,Sean Ruffner,Sean Ruffner,Jeff Mariotte,Brett Booth
